name: Billing Failed
subject: Oh no! Your payment has failed!
body:
Dear {{customer.firstname}} {{customer.lastname}}

We experienced a problem processing the payment for your SIX CRM account {{account.name}} with the credit card {{creditcard.type}} ending in {{creditcard.lastfour}}.

Please log-in to SIX and update your payment method in order to continue using SIX. You can find your current payment option in the Billing section of SIX under your account settings.

Access SIX Billing

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@six.zendesk.com

Best,
Your SIX CRM Support Team

name: Billing Reminder
subject: Your SIX subscription payment is overdue!
body:
Dear {{customer.firstname}} {{customer.lastname}}

One week ago, the payment for your SIX CRM account failed. If you'd like to continue using SIX, Please log-in to SIX and update your payment method. You can find your current payment option in the Billing section of SIX under your account settings.

In one week, we will be forced to limit your account. You will not be able to make or accept outside API calls or run new transactions from within SIX.

Access SIX Billing

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@six.zendesk.com

Best,
Your SIX CRM Support Team

name: Account Limited
subject: Your SIX account has been limited
body:
Dear {{customer.firstname}} {{customer.lastname}}

It has been two weeks since the payment for your SIX CRM account {{account.name}} failed. Your account has now been placed under restrictions. This means that you will no longer be able to accept outside API calls or run new orders from withing the SIX application.

If you'd like to continue using SIX, Please log-in to SIX and update your payment method. You can find your current payment option in the Billing section of SIX under your account settings.

If your account hits 30 days overdue, we will be forced to deactivate your account, at which point you will lose access to SIX altogether.

Access SIX Billing

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@six.zendesk.com

Best,
Your SIX CRM Support Team

name: Billing Final Warning
subject: Avoid SIX account deactivation! Please log in and pay for your subscription.
body:
Dear {{customer.firstname}} {{customer.lastname}}

Your account payment is now 25 days overdue. In five days, your account {{account.name}} will be deactivated and you will no longer be able to access your SIX data

If you'd like to continue using SIX and retain access to your SIX data, please log-in to SIX and update your payment method. You can find your current payment options in the Billing section of SIX under your account settings.

Access SIX Billing

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@six.zendesk.com

Best,
Your SIX CRM Support Team

name: Account Deactivated
subject: Your SIX account has been deactivated
body:
Dear {{customer.firstname}} {{customer.lastname}}

We regret to inform you that your SIX account {{account.name}} has been deactivated due to your failure to make payment.

If you'd like to continue using SIX, please log-in to SIX and select a subscription plan. You will be asked to pay for the subscription plan as well as for any outstanding charges accured prior to your account deactivation.

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at support@six.zendesk.com

Best,
Your SIX CRM Support Team
